main event: A visual observation of an unidentified object during a brief sighting on September 1, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to have lasted 2-3 minutes., The observer saw the object at about the vertical position of a rainbow-like object., The pilots suspected the object to be a parachute., The report mentioned that a camera was used to capture the observation., Multiple images included reflections of the sun known as parhelia.
sighted object: unknown object possibly resembling a parachute
